actor_awards.notes: A prolific actor in film, television, and radio, known for his resonant voice and commanding presence. He received two Stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame (Motion Picture and Television).

filmography.title: The Bad and the Beautiful
filmography.role_description: A talented director who is betrayed by his ambitious producer friend, played by Kirk Douglas.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director, and a writer to achieve success, regardless of the personal cost to them.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress (Gloria Grahame)

filmography.title: Forty Guns
filmography.role_description: A reformed gunslinger turned federal marshal who arrives in Arizona to arrest a mail robber.
filmography.plot: A marshal arrives in Cochise County to arrest a criminal, but finds the town controlled by a powerful female rancher with forty hired guns.

filmography.title: Jeopardy
filmography.role_description: A husband and father who becomes trapped under a heavy jetty piling as the tide rises, leaving his wife to find help.
filmography.plot: A family vacation turns into a nightmare when the father gets trapped by a jetty and the mother is held hostage by an escaped convict.

filmography.title: The Gangster
filmography.role_description: A cynical, brooding mobster who controls the rackets in a beachside community but is consumed by paranoia.
filmography.plot: A gangster's hold on his territory is threatened by a rival syndicate and his own inner demons.

filmography.title: Planet of the Vampires
filmography.role_description: The commander of a spaceship that lands on a mysterious planet where the dead return to life.
filmography.plot: The crew of a spaceship crash-lands on a fog-shrouded planet, only to find that the disembodied inhabitants plan to possess their bodies to escape.

filmography.title: Tension
filmography.role_description: A homicide detective who uses psychology to crack a murder case involving a pharmacist and a femme fatale.
filmography.plot: A pharmacist plots to kill his wife's lover but decides against it, only to become a suspect when the man is murdered anyway.

filmography.title: The Great Gatsby
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, arrogant husband of Daisy Buchanan in this early adaptation of Fitzgerald's novel.
filmography.plot: A jazz-age bootlegger tries to win back the love of his life, who is now married to a wealthy socialite.

filmography.title: Seven Ways from Sundown
filmography.role_description: A charismatic outlaw who forms a bond with the young Texas Ranger sent to capture him.
filmography.plot: A green Texas Ranger is tasked with capturing a legendary outlaw, who charms and mentors him on the journey back to jail.

filmography.title: Strategic Air Command
filmography.role_description: The wing commander who oversees James Stewart's character's return to active duty.
filmography.plot: A professional baseball player is recalled to military service to fly B-36 and B-47 bombers for the Strategic Air Command.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Motion Picture Story

filmography.title: Cause for Alarm!
filmography.role_description: A bedridden, paranoid husband who believes his wife is trying to kill him and writes an incriminating letter.
filmography.plot: A woman desperately tries to retrieve a letter written by her delusional husband that falsely accuses her of murder.

filmography.title: Pat Garrett and Billy the Kid
filmography.role_description: A powerful cattle baron who hires Pat Garrett to eliminate Billy the Kid.
filmography.plot: An aging lawman is hired by wealthy cattle barons to hunt down his old friend, the outlaw Billy the Kid.
filmography.awards: BAFTA: Nomination – Most Promising Newcomer (Kris Kristofferson)

filmography.title: Earthquake
filmography.role_description: A seismologist who predicts the massive earthquake that devastates Los Angeles.
filmography.plot: Various Los Angeles residents struggle to survive a catastrophic earthquake that destroys the city.

filmography.title: Payment on Demand
filmography.role_description: A successful businessman whose marriage to a social-climbing wife disintegrates.
filmography.plot: A woman reflects on her ruthless climb to social success and the toll it took on her marriage as she faces divorce.

filmography.title: No Man of Her Own
filmography.role_description: The brother of the deceased man whose identity is assumed by the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A pregnant woman assumes the identity of a fellow passenger killed in a train wreck, entering a wealthy family with secrets of their own.

filmography.title: Suspense
filmography.role_description: A shady promoter who becomes the object of affection for an ice skating star's wife.
filmography.plot: A peanut vendor rises to manage an ice show and falls in love with the star skater, leading to a dangerous triangle.

filmography.title: Light in the Piazza
filmography.role_description: The father of a developmentally disabled young woman who falls in love in Italy.
filmography.plot: An American mother travels to Italy with her daughter, who has the mental age of a child, and must decide whether to allow her to marry an Italian boy.

filmography.title: Three Guys Named Mike
filmography.role_description: An advertising executive and one of three men named Mike vying for the affection of a stewardess.
filmography.plot: A young airline stewardess finds herself courted by three different men named Mike.

filmography.title: A Gathering of Eagles
filmography.role_description: A base commander who is relieved of duty for failing a surprise inspection.
filmography.plot: A new commander takes over a Strategic Air Command wing and drives his men hard to improve their readiness, at a cost to his personal relationships.

filmography.title: Oh, God!
filmography.role_description: A skeptical religious leader who questions the man who claims to have spoken to God.
filmography.plot: God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good-natured old man and asks him to spread a message.

filmography.title: Lady in the Dark
filmography.role_description: The psychoanalyst who helps the protagonist uncover the root of her anxieties through dream analysis.
filmography.plot: A successful fashion magazine editor seeks psychiatric help to understand her strange dreams and unhappiness.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Cinematography, Best Art Direction, Best Music

filmography.title: Shark!
filmography.role_description: A scientist conducting underwater research who hires a gunrunner, leading to treasure hunting and danger.
filmography.plot: A gunrunner stranded in a Sudanese port is hired by a scientist, but discovers the mission involves sunken treasure.

filmography.title: Pyro
filmography.role_description: An engineer who seeks horrific revenge after his family is killed in a fire started by a jealous lover.
filmography.plot: A man burned in a fire that killed his family creates a new face for himself and seeks revenge on the woman responsible.

filmography.title: An American Dream
filmography.role_description: A police detective investigating the suspicious death of a TV commentator's wife.
filmography.plot: A television commentator murders his wife and gets involved with the mob and the police while trying to cover it up.

filmography.title: Duffy's Tavern
filmography.role_description: Appears as himself in this musical comedy featuring a host of Paramount stars.
filmography.plot: The staff of a tavern try to help a record manufacturer whose plant is facing bankruptcy.

filmography.title: Arrangement with Death
filmography.role_description: Sullivan's final film role.
filmography.plot: Also known as 'The Last Straw'. A crime thriller involving a cop investigating a murder.
